attributes.action: Stop Perpetrators of domestic violence Playing The Police System
attributes.additional_details:
Perpetrators of DV making false allegations in order to further harass victim after victim leaves the relationship.
The government needs to create a liaison officer that is referred to DV cases that are post separation when perpetrators allegations become continuos. Repeated Arrest Due to False allegations is not only a waste of police time but defamation of the victims character for the purpose of family court issues and social worker reports.the system is being played by perpetrators ,This  is avoidable and should be made an arrest able offence  This is a form of continued abuse by perpetrator condoned by police and emotionally  traumatic for the victim and any children involved .
